content.rendered:
• Simple, Addictive Gameplay: Flick the basketball into the hoop with a single touch. It’s easier than it looks!
  • Challenging Gameplay: As you progress, the hoops will get smaller and the shots will become more difficult.

Instructions:

  1. Flick the Basketball: Tap and hold the screen to aim your shot, then release to flick the basketball towards the hoop.
  2. Score Points: Make a successful shot to earn points.
  3. Progress to New Levels: As you score more points, you’ll unlock new levels with more challenging hoops and obstacles.
  4. Beat Your High Score: Try to beat your personal best and become the ultimate basketball champion!
